string-array.name: about_titles
string-array.item: Autistic people can live a full life
It\'s not clear what causes autism
Autistic people can have any level of intelligence

string-array.name: about_contents
string-array.item: Autism, or autism spectrum disorder (ASD), refers to a broad range of conditions characterized by challenges with social skills, repetitive behaviors, speech and nonverbal communication.

Being autistic does not mean you have an illness or disease. It means your brain works in a different way from other people. \n \n It\'s something you\'re born with. Signs of autism might be noticed when you\'re very young, or not until you\'re older.

Being autistic does not have to stop you having a good life. Like everyone, autistic people have things they\'re good at as well as things they struggle with. Being autistic does not mean you can never make friends, have relationships or get a job
Autism is a spectrum. This means everybody with autism is different. Some autistic people need little or no support. Others may need help from a parent or carer every day.
Nobody knows what causes autism, or if it has a cause. It can affect people in the same family. So it may sometimes be passed on to a child by their parents.

Some autistic people have average or above average intelligence. Some autistic people have a learning disability. This means they may find it hard to look after themselves and need help with daily life.

resources.string: 1. I often notice small sounds when others do not
2. I usually concentrate more on the whole picture, rather than the small details
3. I find it easy to do more than one thing at once
4. If there is an interruption, I can switch back to what I was doing very quickly
5. I find it easy to ‘read between the lines’ when someone is talking to me
6. I know how to tell if someone listening to me is getting bored
7. When I’m reading a story I find it difficult to work out the characters’ intentions
8. I like to collect information about categories of things (e.g. types of car, types of bird, types of train, types of plant etc)
9. I find it easy to work out what someone is thinking or feeling just by looking at their face
10. I find it difficult to work out people’s intentions

string-array.name: feature_description
string-array.item: It shows whether or not the patients was born with jaundice
Whether or not anyone in the immediate family has been diagnosed with autism
For whether or not the patients has ever used a screening app
Relation of person who completed the test

resources.string: Now that you know what Autism is, are you ready to take a test?
Please do your test to see your result
Autism is not a disability. \n It\'s a Different Ability.
Is there anyone in your family that\'s diagnosed with autsim?
Have you ever use a screening app before?
Relation of person who completed the test?
Autism, or autism spectrum disorder (ASD), refers to a broad range of conditions characterized by challenges with social skills, repetitive behaviors, speech and nonverbal communication.
A Screening Tool for Autism in \n Young Adults and Adults.

Dataset used for this project contains a survey results from more than 700 people who filled out the survey. There are labels that shows whether or not a person is diagnosed with autism. This can help machine learning models to be made and thus allowing healthcare professional to prioritize their resources. \n \n Below is the first 10 rows of the dataset.
This dataset contains 700+ rows with 21 columns. You can access the full Dataset through this link:
The image above shows the visualization of the neural network with weight on each of the connections.

It\'s a Sequential model with an activation function of ReLU for the hidden layers and Sigmoid for the output layer. Though ReLU is best used for CNN(Convolutional Neural Network), it\'s also good for ANN(Artificial Neural Network).

The architecture of the model contains an input layer with the size of 0,18. With 3 hidden layer with the size of 0, 10 -> 0, 8 -> 0,8 respectively. Lastly it has an output layer with the size of 0, 1.
